// === ENEMY AI (Patrol + Shoot) ===
// Enemy: instance vars → HP=3, Dir=choose(-1,1), FireCD=0

On created
→ Enemy: Set Dir to choose(-1,1)
→ Enemy: Set HP to 3
→ Enemy: Set FireCD to 0

Every tick
→ Enemy: Subtract dt from FireCD

// Patrol
Every 0.1 seconds
→ System: Enemy.Dir = -1 → Enemy: Platform → Simulate control Left
→ System: Enemy.Dir = 1 → Enemy: Platform → Simulate control Right

// Turn at edges/obstacles (offset checks)
Enemy: Is overlapping at offset (Dir*8, 16) with Solid
→ Enemy: Set Dir to -Enemy.Dir
Enemy: Is NOT overlapping at offset (Dir*12, 40) with Solid
→ Enemy: Set Dir to -Enemy.Dir

// Mirror
Enemy: Compare Dir = -1 → Enemy: Set mirrored
Else → Enemy: Set not mirrored

// Shoot at player when in range
Enemy: Distance(Player) < 520 AND Enemy.FireCD <= 0
→ System: Create object EnemyBullet at (Enemy.ImagePointX(1), Enemy.ImagePointY(1))
→ EnemyBullet: Set angle toward (Player.X, Player.Y)
→ EnemyBullet: Set bullet speed to 600
→ Enemy: Set FireCD to 1.2

// Enemy takes damage handled in Main (on bullet collision)
Enemy: Compare HP <= 0
→ System: Create object Explosion at (Enemy.X, Enemy.Y)
→ Destroy Enemy
